thag7.4:1.2: walking mindfully in the shade of the terrace,
thag7.4:1.4: and bowed to the supreme among men.
thag7.4:2.1: Arranging my robe over one shoulder
thag7.4:2.3: I walked alongside that stainless one,
thag7.4:3.1: The wise one, expert in questions,
thag7.4:4.1: When all his questions were answered,
thag7.4:5.1: “It is a blessing for the people of Aṅga and Magadha
thag7.4:5.6: it’s a blessing for them,” he declared.
thag7.4:6.2: you are invited to come and see me.
thag7.4:7.4: oh, the excellence of the teaching!
